constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 21 (Thursday, February 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. POSEY:
H.R. 834.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1, which gives Congress the
power to spend for the general welfare of the United States;
and Article I, Section 5, Clause 2, which gives Congress the
power to determine the rules of its proceedings, including
the power to create commissions within the legislative
branch.
[Page H388]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: PREPARE Act
